title: The Sands of Yellow Rock
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Kingcroft Productions and Jack Gardiner
brief_description: Surveys the decay and decline of the Wollambi Valley area, N.S.W., and shows the investigations carried out by the Hunter Valley Research Foundation. Indicates methods used to check erosion and flooding.
creator_credit_for_label: John Kingsford-Smith, Kingcroft Productions and Jack Gardiner
